about_the_game:
Guardião Tupã is a fantasy adventure set in a world where the creatures of the Brazilian folk are being threatened by the dreaded Dry Body, which seeks to break the balance and invade other worlds. On this journey, you take control of a newly created being using part of the energies of an ancient guardian. This being sets out to recover its strength and restore the balance, also learning more about this world and Brazilian culture in the process.

Features


  • Explore a fantastic world

    An entity is threatening the kingdom and only the remnants of the old guardian can reverse the situation! Fight corruption and restore balance to the forest.




  • Use your amber hook

    Your amber hook can do much more than just destroy, traverse great distances, and combine your skills to forge a brighter future.




  • Discover a world of folklore and fantasy inspired by Brazilian culture

    Face the dreaded Dry Body, restore balance and save various endangered entities.
